txt.en: 'The Trollshaws are full of danger, friend. You would be wise to stay on the road.'
'My friend Barachen keeps camp to the south-east, atop a shadowed hill.'
'The Last Bridge is to the west. Give my regards to Alphlanc if you go that way.'
'The sons of Elrond have a camp at Thorenhad, far to the north-east.'
